description: Angel food cake has a texture and appearance (and even some necessary equipment) that's entirely its own. It's sweetness and light, in dessert form. Yet it remains something of a kitchen curiosity. Where did it come from, and what accounts for its enduring appeal? As it turns out, this ethereal, cloud-like dessert is an American invention.
